Description:
You are at the entrance of the burning house, clearly this was a poor man's house and you can see that the contents inside are already destroyed or burned.

Before you leave, a chest catches your eye, although the chest is still on fire.

The fire is spreading rapidly and there will be nothing left in a few moments.
DescriptionAction: Will you venture in to the flames for a poor man's chest?
